column.name: ENTITY_ID
column.comment: This column data identifies the ENTITY (INDIVIDUAL or ORGANIZATION) for which the ACCESS INFORMATION is defined.

column.name: ACCESS_INFORMATION_ID
column.comment: ACCESS_INFORMATION_ID - This column data uniquely identifies the Access Information among the other Access Informations.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The effective Date of the Email Validation - The Access Information is effective dated.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: Data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: Effective Status of Email Validation - The effective status determines if the Access Information is active or inactive at that point in time.

column.name: CONTACT_NAME
column.comment: This column data contains the contact name for an ORGANIZATION. If an INDIVIDUAL, rather than an ORGANIZATION, is created, the name will be defaulted to the customer name.

column.name: ACCESS_INFORMATION_TYPE_RD
column.comment: ACCESS_INFORMATION_TYPE_RD - This column data documents the general uses for a particular ADDRESS or ACCESS INFORMATION of an ENTITY. It specifies the type of ADDRESS/ACCESS INFORMATION defined for the ENTITY.

column.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS
column.comment: Email Address - This column stores a text string that represents the email address defined for contact.

column.name: FAX_NUMBER
column.comment: This column data is the fax phone number for the landline phone defined as contact.

column.name: PHONE_NUMBER
column.comment: This column data is the local phone number for the landline phone defined as contact.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update - Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update - Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is incremented on each update. Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries according to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). "N" (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was valid some then in the past, "F" (future) - entity will be valid in the future.

column.name: MOBILE_NUMBER
column.comment: Mobile number of the access contact

column.name: ELECTRONIC_CONTACT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates whether to contact per email
